subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: David Goffin, a 21-year-old Belgian, advanced to the fourth round, further than any men’s lucky loser in the French Open in 34 years. He will play Roger Federer next.
snippet: David Goffin, a 21-year-old Belgian, advanced to the fourth round, further than any men’s lucky loser in the French Open in 34 years. He will play Roger Federer next.
